quote: The only way to escape from reality is to create your own.
author: Thomas Pynchon

quote: Imagination is more real than reality.
author: André Breton

quote: Beauty will be convulsive or will not be.
author: André Breton

quote: Liberty, liberty, what crimes are committed in your name!
author: Paul Éluard

quote: There is no beauty without strangeness.
author: Paul Éluard

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Paul Éluard

quote: I paint what I see, and not what others want me to see.
author: Édouard Manet

quote: The only truth is the truth of light.
author: Édouard Manet

quote: A painting is never finished.
author: Édouard Manet

quote: Life is a story, and you are the author.
author: Paul Auster

quote: The future is not a destination; it is a path.
author: Paul Auster

quote: The only way to find meaning in life is to create it yourself.
author: Paul Auster

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The only way to avoid failure is to never try.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest achievement.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The only way to avoid failure is to never try.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The only way to escape from reality is to create your own.
author: Thomas Pynchon

quote: Imagination is more real than reality.
author: André Breton

quote: Beauty will be convulsive or will not be.
author: André Breton

quote: Reality is a construction of our ideology.
author: Slavoj Žižek

quote: The problem is not that we don't know the truth, but that we don't want to know it.
author: Slavoj Žižek

quote: There is no such thing as free choice.
author: Slavoj Žižek

quote: Chaos is not the opposite of order; it is the order that we cannot yet understand.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The meaning of life is to find your purpose and to fulfill it.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The only way to overcome a challenge is to face it head-on.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The only true happiness is in giving.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: The world is not what it seems; it's what we make it.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Sometimes you have to lose yourself in order to find yourself.
author: Haruki Murakami
